Documentation des fonctions membres
__get() __getAbstractStorage AbstractStorage__get
__get ( $var)
Getter for has-properties. The standard has properties are: hasFolder, hasUniqueid, hasDelete, hasCreate, hasTop
The valid values for the has-properties are:
true if a feature is supported
false if a feature is not supported
null is it's not yet known or it can't be know if a feature is supported
Paramètres
string$var
property name
Exceptions
Exception
InvalidArgumentException Renvoie
bool supported or not
Réimplémentée dans Pop3.
close() closeAbstractStorage AbstractStorageclose
close ( )[abstract]
Close resource for mail lib. If you need to control, when the resource is closed. Otherwise the destructor would call this.

getNumberByUniqueId() getNumberByUniqueIdAbstractStorage AbstractStoragegetNumberByUniqueId
getNumberByUniqueId ( $id)[abstract]
get a message number from a unique id
I.e. if you have a webmailer that supports deleting messages you should use unique ids as parameter and use this method to translate it to message number right before calling removeMessage()
Paramètres
string$id
unique id
Renvoie
int message number
Exceptions
Exception
ExceptionInterface
Réimplémentée dans Imap, Maildir, Mbox, et Pop3.

rewind() rewindAbstractStorage AbstractStoragerewind
rewind ( )
Iterator::rewind()
Rewind always gets the new count from the storage. Thus if you use the interfaces and your scripts take long you should use reset() from time to time. Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
